text: Hagi ana maka mopafi vahe'mo'za Babiloni kini ne' Nebukatnesa eri'za vahe manime nevanageno hanige'za, mofavre'amofo eri'za erime nevuza negeho eri'za vahe umanigahaze. Ana hume nevanageno vuno Babiloni kuma'ma haviza hugahiema hu'na huhampari'noa knare uhanatigahie. Ana hanige'za maka kokantegati hankave kini vahe'mo'za Babiloni vahera ha' eme huzamagatere'za kegava huzamante'nage'za kazokzo eri'za vahe manigahaze.
